text: Gérard Debreu (; 4 July 1921 – 31 December 2004) was a French economist and mathematician. He was a professor of economics at the University of California, Berkeley. He won the 1983 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2004 deaths Category:French economists Category:French geometers Category:Topologists
title: Gérard Debreu
